articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun at 00:00 Thursday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star), to pay high tribute to him.
					 Accompanying him were KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau; senior party and army officials Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Myong Su, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, Ri Man Gon, O Su Yong, Kim Yong Chol, Choe Pu Il, Jo Yon Jun and Ri Pyong Chol; and officials of the party and armed forces organs.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un entered the hall where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il stand.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues.
					
					 Also laid at the statues was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un together with the participants paid high tribute to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 He entered the hall of immortality where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He made bow to Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence.
					
					 The participants went round a hall where orders Kim Jong Il received are on display and halls which house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him for his field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of his life.

articles.title: Senior State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Senior officials of the state visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among them were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, and other senior state officials, the chairman of a friendly party, officials of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang and officials of ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the WPK, the state and the army.
					
					 Also seen there was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 Placed there was a floral basket in the joint name of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 At the hall of immortality where Kim Jong Il lies in state, they paid homage to him.
					
					 They looked round the hall where orders Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls that house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him during his field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Meanwhile, many service personnel of the People's Army and working people in various circles visited the palace to pay tribute to Kim Jong Il on the same day.

articles.title: KPA Service Personnel Meets
articles.content:
KPA Service Personnel Meets
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces of the Korean People's Army (KPA) held a ceremony at the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Wednesday to pay high tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and pledge their loyalty to respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Vice Marshal of the KPA Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affaires Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, Vice Marshal of the KPA Ri Myong Su, chief of the KPA General Staff, and other KPA commanding officers, service personnel of the Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces and cadets of the military academies at all levels and students of revolutionary schools.
					
					 There was a ceremony of the military band of the KPA.
					
					 All the participants paid the respectful homage to the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A gun salute boomed.
					
					 Hwang Pyong So made a speech in which the service personnel paid high tribute to the Generalissimos and pledged loyalty to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The speaker said that the KPA would thoroughly carry out the behests of the Generalissimos unconditionally without an inch of deflection or a step of concession by regarding the behests as the lifeline in order to firmly defend and boundlessly glorify the army-building exploits of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 He noted that the KPA would make thorough-going preparations for the final decisive battle while maintaining a high alert in line with the requirements of the acute situation in which the enemies' aggression war moves against the DPRK inch close to a reckless phase day by day and thus wipe out the group of aggressors with decisive and merciless preemptive strike once an order is given and build a reunified great power on the land of three thousand-ri without fail.
					
					 Then followed a march-past of the KPA Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces, cadets of the military academies at all levels and students of revolutionary schools.
					
					 When the flags bearing the portraits of the smiling Generalissimos appeared, all the participants paid high tribute to the flags.
					
					 Ranks marched to the tune of revolutionary military music flying the colours of the Supreme Commander. 
					
					 Fireworks were displayed.

articles.title: Joint National Meeting of Korean Children's Union Organizations Held
articles.content:
Joint National Meeting of Korean Children's Union Organizations Held
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations took place here on Feb. 16, the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 It was attended by the delegates of the KCU organizations from each province and schoolchildren here, and pupils to join the KCU.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, and Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, and officials of the youth league and officials concerned and war veterans and persons of merit.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., the youth league, in his report recalled that Kim Jong Il brought up the rising generations into the pillars of powerful Korea with his noble outlook on the generations to come as natural disposition.
					
					 He noted that the history of his love for them has been given a steady continuity thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then followed a KCU admission ceremony.
					
					 The pupils joining the KCU took an oath led by Choe Thae Bok.
					
					 Officials, war veterans and persons of merit put red ties around the necks of the pupils and pinned KCU badges on their dresses.
					
					 The new KCU members made the first salute of the KCU members, responding to the slogan "Let us be always ready for socialist country!"
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made at the meeting.

articles.title: International Kim Jong Il Prize Council Gives Reception
articles.content:
International Kim Jong Il Prize Council Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The International Kim Jong Il Prize Council gave a reception Thursday in connection with the fact that a ceremony of the conferment of the International Kim Jong Il Prize took place.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and concurrently minister of Higher Education who doubles as chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, and others and Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party.
					
					 On hand were Mukesh Sharma, secretary general of the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council, and his party, Alexandr Prokhanov, editor-in-chief of the Zavtra who is a director of the above-said council, and his party.
					
					 Speakers at the reception said that the International Kim Jong Il Prize is an international prize which is conferred upon famous personages in political, social and academic circles and businesspersons in all countries who made special contributions to the struggle for independence of the countries and nations, the cause of global independence and peace and development of human culture.
					
					 They praised Kim Jong Il for making distinguished contributions to accomplishing the cause of global peace and independence.

articles.title: Dancing Party of Women's Union Officials and Members Held
articles.content:
Dancing Party of Women's Union Officials and Members Held 
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of women's union officials and members took place at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph on Feb. 16, the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 When song "Glory to General" resounded forth, the participants began dancing, looking back on his feats.
					
					 Profound reverence for Kim Jong Il could be read on the faces of the women dancing to the tunes of "The General Star Beyond the Clouds" and other songs. 
					
					 They cheerfully danced to the tune of song "Our Leader Loved by People", extending the highest glory to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The festive mood revved up when songs "Ongheya", etc. were played.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth, Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth, Students Held
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held on Thursday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Dancing parties started as songs "Please Accept Best Wishes of People" resounded forth at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Arch of Triumph and other places.
					
					 Youth and students danced to the tune of "February Is Spring" and other songs, extending glory to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They were full of conviction that the desire of Kim Jong Il for building a socialist power would surely come true thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The dancing parties took place in provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Fireworks Displayed in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Fireworks Displayed in Pyongyang 
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Fireworks were displayed in the sky above Pyongyang in celebration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Both banks of the River Taedong centering around Kim Il Sung Square and the Tower of the Juche Idea were crowded with people from all walks of life and school youth and students in Thursday evening to see the fireworks.
					
					 At 19:00, fireworks were displayed amid the playing of song "Ode to Comrade Kim Jong Il".
					
					 Watching the fireworks, the masses recollected the career of Kim Jong Il who performed immortal exploits for the country.
					
					 Amid the playing of "Thunder over Jong Il Peak" and other songs, multi-color fireworks were displayed in the nocturnal sky over Pyongyang, revving up the festive atmosphere.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Celebrated with Splendor
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Celebrated with Splendor
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Service personnel and people of the DPRK celebrated the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) with splendor.
					 An endless stream of people visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					
					 They paid tribute to the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the plaza of the palace.
					
					 Service personnel and people from all walks of life and youths and students visited the statues of the great leaders and portraits of the smiling great leaders on Mansu Hill and in different parts of the country to pay tribute to them.
					
					 People also visited the venue of the 21st Kimjongilia festival here and Kimjongilia exhibition halls in each province with yearning for him.
					
					 People from all walks of life went round the venues of the photo shows on his revolutionary history.
					
					 Art performances were given at theatres here and in other parts of the country.
					
					 A drama "Blood Vessel" was given at the National Theatre.
					
					 Magicians gave performances at the Magic Theatre of the National Acrobatic Troupe.
					
					 Artistes across the country gave colorful performances.
					
					 Art performances were also given at the construction sites and various industrial establishments and on different farms.
					
					 Pupils across the country joined the Korean Children's Union.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Tours Kimjongilia Festival Venue
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Tours Kimjongilia Festival Venue
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here toured the venue of the 21st Kimjongilia Festival on Thursday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Military attaches looked round immortal flowers in full bloom, admiring the reverence of the Korean people and world progressives for Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
 Nampho, February 16 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen met at Nampho Port on Thursday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Nampho City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the meeting were captains and crewmen of Panama-flagged ship and China Taipei-flagged ship Zhang Hong 1.
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a nuclear power and space power in the East and led the cause of global independence to victory.
					
					 They noted that Kim Jong Il will always be alive in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressives and his revolutionary history will last forever along with the prosperity of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 They wished the Korean people bigger successes in their struggle for building a powerful socialist country under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Thursday, the Day of the Shining Star (the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il).
					 They included foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches of foreign embassies here, the participants in an event of awarding the International Kim Jong Il Prize, the participants in the 21st Kimjongilia Festival, the congratulatory groups of Koreans in Japan and the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star and families of overseas Koreans related to revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state, they made bows to him.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls which house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him during his field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Meanwhile, the chief and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and paid homage to Kim Jong Il on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Registered as Honorary National Leader of Nigerian Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Registered as Honorary National Leader of Nigerian Party
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Better Nigeria Progressive Party registered leader Kim Jong Il as its honorary national leader.
					 A ceremony of conveying the certificate of the title of honorary national leader to Kim Jong Il took place in Abuja on February 10.
					
					 Present there were personages of the Better Nigeria Progressive Party, the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association and the DPRK ambassador to Nigeria and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Goodswill Nnaji, national chairman of the Better Nigeria Progressive Party, handed over the certificate to DPRK Ambassador Jong Yong Chol.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Nigerian Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Nigerian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Today's DPRK would have been unthinkable without leader Kim Jong Il, Goodswill Nnaji, national chairman of the Better Nigeria Progressive Party, said on February 10 when conveying a gift presented to him to the DPRK ambassador to Nigeria.
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il performed great exploits in strengthening the Workers' Party of Korea, laying solid foundations for the prosperity of socialist Korea and increasing the military muscle of the country in every way, the national chairman went on:
					
					 Thanks to his great idea and tested and energetic leadership, the DPRK demonstrated its unimaginable and tremendous might.
					
					 That's why I prepared the gift in reverence for HE Kim Jong Il who was born in Mt Paektu, the holy mountain of Korea, as the shining star and is always bringing bright light to the building of a socialist power and the global cause of independence.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Equatorial Guinean Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Equatorial Guinean Party Leader
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Feb. 3 received a congratulatory message from Jeronimo Osa Osa Ecoro, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea.
					 The general secretary in the message said that all the members of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and its supporters, on behalf of Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, founder-chairman of the Party, extend heartfelt and warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un and to the WPK and all the Korean people on the occasion of the 75th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of the WPK and eternal chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					 The message said they hope that the DPRK would celebrate the anniversary with splendor, paying tribute to Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of the Korean people.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Malian Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Malian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Tiemoko Sangare, chairman of the African Party for Solidarity and Justice of Mali, on Feb 7.
					 Tiemoko Sangare in his message extended, on behalf of all the members of the Party and on his own behalf, the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The message said that Kim Jong Il is always alive along with the ever-victorious WPK which guides the Korean people's general advance for building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 It heartily wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and bigger successes in his responsible work for the building of a powerful country and national reunification.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on February 7.
					 The national leader in the message paid high tribute, on behalf of all members of his party and on his own behalf, to leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his 75th birth anniversary, the most significant day for the Korean people.
					
					 The message praised Kim Jong Il for pursuing the Songun politics on the basis of his deep insight into the international political situation, resolutely foiling all aggressive and provocative moves of the imperialists to stifle socialist Korea and firmly defending the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the Korean nation.
					
					 Expressing belief that his undying exploits would always remain in the international history of politics, it sincerely wished Kim Jong Un bigger successes in his noble work for leading the WPK and the Korean people to victory.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, working people of various circles and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il across the country and paid tribute to them to mark the Day of the Shining Star, Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary.
					 Seen before the statues on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, the state and the army.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the Party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, and institutions, enterprises, factories, schools, etc. in Pyongyang, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Also placed there was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statues.
					
					 Laid before the statues at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other parts of Pyongyang were floral baskets in the names of units of the KPA, institutions and enterprises.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children across the country visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and portraits of the smiling great leaders in their residential areas and paid tribute to the great leaders before their statues.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from AINDF Central Committee
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from AINDF Central Committee
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Thursday, the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The message said that the life of Kim Jong Il shines as the annals of the most outstanding leader and peerless patriot who performed undying exploits before the motherland, nation, times and humankind despite manifold difficulties under the uplifted banner of the red flag of the revolution all his life. 
					
					 It noted that as Kim Jong Il led the nationwide struggle of all Koreans for achieving independent reunification and the great national unity by thoroughly carrying out the three charters for national reunification, the whole land of Korea was swept by the strong trend for independent reunification, peace and prosperity in the June 15 era of reunification advancing in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 It pointed out that the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il are being carried forward, commanding admiration from the people of the world, as the army and people of the DPRK are holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem today.
					
					 The path of national reunification and the ways of struggle for it clarified by Kim Jong Un at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and in his New Year Address for this year serve as practical programmes for achieving the cause of independent reunification at an earliest possible date and the banner arousing all Koreans to the nationwide struggle for building dignified, prosperous and reunified power, it said.
					
					 It is the highest glory and the greatest fortune of the Korean nation to have Kim Jong Un as its supreme leader in high esteem as he is turning Juche Korea into a powerful and prosperous country and bringing earlier the victory of independent reunification being possessed of unusual ability in pen and sword and tireless energy that can be of no match to any one in the world, the message stressed.
					
					 It noted that the AINDF Central Committee would open up a broad avenue to independent reunification without fail this year marking the 45th anniversary of the publication of the July 4 joint statement and the 10th anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration while holding fast to the Juche-oriented reunification line and policies advanced by Kim Jong Un as the ever-victorious banner for national reunification.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in 25th Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in 25th Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on Thursday received a letter from Edvin Marton on behalf of the Russian, French, Italian and Canadian figure skaters and from Mikhail Koroliuk on behalf of the Belarusian Figure Skating Team, who are participating in the 25th Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star (the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il).
					 The letter said that it is the greatest honor and fortune for them to take part in the festival and celebrate with the Korean people the 75th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It noted that the festival which is being held on a grand scale every year is a gathering of friendship where excellent figure skaters from various countries across the world can celebrate the Day of the Shining Star, the greatest national holiday of the Korean people, and can share figure skating technique and experience under the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 It pointed out that by displaying a high level of figure skating demonstration, they will contribute to the celebration of the Day of the Shining Star more jubilantly and bring joy to the Korean people who are engaged in the struggle for building a powerful country.

articles.title: 21st Kimjongilia Festival On-going in Pyongyang
articles.content:
21st Kimjongilia Festival On-going in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The 21st Kimjongilia Festival is going on with large attendance in Pyongyang.
					 Since its opening, a great number of people have visited the venue of the festival every day. On February 16 alone, the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il, more than a hundred thousand people visited there.
					
					 What draws visitors' attention in the festival is a display stand prepared by the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries. Put on its stand are 250 potted Kimjongilias presented by over 50 bodies of foreign countries, including the Asia-Pacific Regional Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu and Kim Jong Il Kindergarten in Mongolia.
					
					 The General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps represents the red flag by 300 potted Kimjongilias with the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il on its centre. Among those flowers are nearly 80 potted Kimjongilias sent by the president of the Syrian Arab Republic, the general secretary of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and diplomatic missions of various countries and international bodies here.
					
					 The Korean Overseas Exhibition General Bureau decorates its stand with 200 potted Kimjongilias against the model Tower of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Visiting the venue of the festival, people have keenly felt that Kim Jong Il always lives as the sun in the hearts of the Korean people and humankind.

articles.title: Mt. Paektu, Sacred Place of Sun
articles.content:
Mt. Paektu, Sacred Place of Sun
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Mt. Paektu, the native place of leader Kim Jong Il, has been regarded as the sacred place of the sun among not only the DPRK people but also the world progressives.
					 The first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Kyrgyzstan said that Mt. Paektu, which fascinates all people with its magnificent image and various natural phenomena, is symbolic of the distinguished personality and temper of Kim Jong Il who possessed great aspiration, rare wisdom, matchless courage, indomitable will, broad magnanimity and outstanding leadership.
					
					 The chairperson of the Nepal Journalist Association noted that Mt. Paektu, the birthplace of Kim Jong Il, will shine as the home dear to the world progressives' heart, and recited the Korean poem "We'll Go to Mt. Paektu Everywhere".
					
					 The president of the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with the DPRK of Ecuador said that H.E. Kim Jong Il made a great contribution to the accomplishment of the human cause of independence with his Songun (military-first) politics. 
					
					 The world progressives' admiration for Kim Jong Il is also witnessed by many craftworks and art works, which portray the Paektusan Secret Camp, presented to him.
					
					 Among them are a mother-of-pearl work representing the sunrise over Mt. Paektu sent from China and "Paektusan Secret Camp" etched on a copper plate which was presented by Philippine figures.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on DPRK's Measures for Bolstering up Its Nuclear Force at High Level
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on DPRK's Measures for Bolstering up Its Nuclear Force at High Level
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The hostile forces including the U.S. are making much fuss over the DPRK's test-fire of surface-to-surface medium to long range strategic ballistic missile Pukguksong-2.
					 Under the manipulation of the U.S., the UN Security Council made public a press release the day after the test-fire in which it vociferated about "breach of resolution" and "additional crucial measure".
					
					 This is a challenge to the legitimate right of a sovereign state and a wanton violation of universally recognized international law.
					
					 This year alone, the U.S. and many other countries vied with each other to test-fire all sorts of rockets including inter-continental ballistic rocket. When taking note of these facts, there would be no legal ground whatsoever to fault the DPRK's test-fire as it is part of the normal process it has to go through in implementing its state line, and a step for self-defence.
					
					 The unbiased international community does not forget the double-standards applied by the U.S. and the UNSC as they turned blind eyes to the test-fire of some countries while cooking up brigandish "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK over its every measure taken to bolster its defence capabilities, terming it "provocation" and "threat."
					
					 In the past the U.S., obsessed by frenzy for putting sanctions on the DPRK to strangle it, abused the UN to cook up harsh "sanctions resolutions" while faulting the DPRK's space development for peaceful purposes and measures for bolstering nuclear deterrence for self-defence, its legitimate right.
					
					 On Jan. 6, 2016 the DPRK conducted its first H-bomb test, thereby showing the U.S. keen on inflicting even nuclear holocaust, not content with sanctions, blockade and military pressure on the DPRK, its tremendous might to firmly defend the country's sovereignty and the nation's right to existence and reliably guarantee the peace and security of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 In its wake the DPRK opened to public its miniaturized nuclear warhead and succeeded in the underwater test-fire of strategic submarine ballistic missile and the test-fire of surface-to-surface medium to long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10, thus displaying the firm will of the country to retaliate against the U.S. resorting to reckless military provocation while talking about heinous "beheading operation" and "high-density strike".
					
					 It also succeeded in nuclear war head explosion test as substantial and stepped-up counteraction to foil the U.S. and other hostile forces' nuclear blackmail and sanctions racket aimed at blatantly challenging the DPRK's exercise of sovereign right while categorically denying its strategic position.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday how the U.S. sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK will end up as they are crimes against humanity designed to totally deny the DPRK's sovereignty and its rights to existence and development, check modern civilization and bring the society of the DPRK back to medieval dark world.
					
					 Nothing can undermine the strategic position of the DPRK which ranked itself with pride among the nuclear powers with a firm hold on the nuclear sword of justice for defending the nation's sovereignty and regional peace and stability.
					
					 Any anti-DPRK steps, the U.S. and its vassal forces are going to take again by abusing the UNSC, would mean a wanton violation of the legitimate right of a sovereign state and universally recognized international law and they will end up in smoke as in the past. This is our warning.
					
					 The escalating moves against the DPRK will compel it to drastically increase its nuclear attack capabilities.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group Slammed for Their Pro-Japanese Act
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group Slammed for Their Pro-Japanese Act
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Pusan Citizens Action for Defending Girl Statue in south Korea held a press conference before a girl statue outside the Japanese Consulate General in Pusan on Feb. 13 to denounce the puppet conservative group for their pro-Japanese act, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 At the press conference speakers recalled that an unidentified man spread papers carrying letters patronizing Japan around the girl statue.
					
					 They said that Yun Pyong Se, minister of Foreign Affairs, is to blame for this.
					
					 Such behavior of the authorities speaking for the Japanese government is bringing pain and humiliation to the people and, furthermore, to the Koreans in Japan, they noted.
					
					 They called upon citizens to protect the girl statue.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Launch Actions for Wage Hike
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Launch Actions for Wage Hike
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Increase of Minimum Wage in south Korea grouping more than 30 civic and public organizations including the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions held a press conference in Seoul on February 13 to demand the puppet National Assembly amend the law for increase of the minimum wage, according to the south Korean internet paper Chamsesang.
					 The speakers urged the NA to positively opt for settling the issue.
					
					 That day, the Citizens Federation for Economic Justice submitted to the NA a written opinion for reducing the number of workers receiving minimum wage and for electing member for public interests of the Minimum Wage Committee.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces Keen on Drill for Infiltrating into DPRK
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces Keen on Drill for Infiltrating into DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Special units of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces started a joint military drill for infiltrating into major objects of the DPRK and destroying them in early February, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 It was confirmed that Ospreys flew into the U.S. Air Force base in Kunsan of south Korea from its two bases in Japan in late January and stayed in south Korea for ten days.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers staged a drill for striking a command and destroying major facilities by infiltrating into the area of the DPRK.

articles.title: Persons of Culture and Arts of Chongryon Meet
articles.content:
Persons of Culture and Arts of Chongryon Meet
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting of persons of culture and arts of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) was held at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Feb. 9 to glorify this year as the year of praising the great persons and the year of change.
					 Present there were Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, Kim Song Hun, director of the Department for Publicity and Culture of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, officials and advisors of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, members of the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe and the Korean Song and Dance Ensemble and heads of different culture and art groups and institutes.
					
					 Kim Jong Su, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, delivered a report.
					
					 He said that the members of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan spurred the patriotic movement by dint of literature and arts by dynamically conducting creative and performing activities, holding exhibitions and carrying out publicity work with deep love for the homeland, compatriots and the younger generations though the Koreans in Japan faced an extremely tense and complicated situation in 2016.
					
					 He underscored the need to further increase the role of literature and arts against the backdrop of the ever more undisguised national discrimination of the Japanese authorities against Koreans in Japan and their suppression of national education reaching its height and to create and disseminate successful works which are suited to the desire and sentiments of the compatriots and which encourage them in the patriotic movement. 
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, lyric poems, songs and photos produced by members of the union last year were presented.
					
					 Introduced were works presented to the photo exhibition marking the 70th anniversary of the enforcement of secondary education for Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Thursday, the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The message extended highest tribute to Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, the eternal sun of Juche Korea, and the greatest glory and warmest congratulations to Marshal Kim Jong Un leading to victory the cause of Juche and the patriotic cause of Chongryon, pioneered and guided by the great leaders.
					
					 It said that the whole life of Kim Jong Il, who had led the cause of Juche for more than 50 years, was the most brilliant life of the peerless patriot as he performed the admirable feats to remain forever in the history of the country by doing whatever possible for prosperity of the country and happiness of all generations to come, true to the high intention of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is a prominent thinker-theoretician who perfectly systemized the guiding idea of the Juche era with his gifted wisdom and energetic pursuit and an iron-willed and brilliant Songun commander who smashed every vicious anti-DPRK move of the imperialist reactionary forces and turned the country into a politico-ideological power based on single-minded unity and an invincible military and nuclear power with his superb Songun leadership, it stressed.
					
					 Praising Kim Jong Il as the outstanding leader who guided Chongryon to be a patriotic pioneer, model of patriotism and loyalty and standard overseas compatriots' organization true to the noble intention of Kim Il Sung and as the guardian of the destiny of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, the messaged said:
					
					 The history of relationship of warm feelings and blood Kim Jong Il forged with the Japan-resident Koreans continues still now under the fatherly love and meticulous care of you, respected Supreme Leader.
					
					 The message expressed the resolve to implement the highly important teachings of Marshal Kim Jong Un including his New Year message and letter dated May 25 of 2015 and thus bring about a turn in laying a foundation of leaping progress that will open up a new heyday in the movement of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the General Association of Koreans in China Thursday on the 75th anniversary of birth of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The letter noted that with his unique Songun politics, Generalissimo Kim Jong Il reliably defended socialism centered on the popular masses, a valuable heritage of President Kim Il Sung, turned the country into an invincible political and military power, a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and an earth satellite manufacturing and launching state and laid solid and eternal foundations for the prosperity of the country and the nation and for the happiness of all generations to come.
					
					 The precious revolutionary feats of Kim Jong Il who had lived every moment of his life with ardent love and noble devotion to the country and the nation only are always kept in the hearts of all Koreans and the world people, and they will shine long for all ages along with socialist Korea which will grow stronger and prosper, it said.
					
					 With noble loyalty and revolutionary obligation, Marshal Kim Jong Un has held Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leader of Kim Il Sung's nation and made sure that steady continuity is given to his sacred revolutionary life and undying revolutionary exploits, the letter noted, adding:
					
					 The officials of the Association and all other Koreans in China will always take the lead in the patriotic movement for great national unity and independent reunification, bearing in mind your instruction that everyone should do something to make this year a very significant year in opening up a new phase for independent reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting and Korean photo, book, stamp and handicraft exhibition took place in Moscow on Feb. 10 with the approach of the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 On display at the venue of the event were photos dealing with the exploits of Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and works of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu and other photos, books, stamps and handicrafts introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Present at the event were personages of the Russian Foreign Ministry, the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences, the Moscow Peace Fund, the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK and the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia and the DPRK ambassador to Russia and his embassy officials.
					
					 V. A. Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, said:
					
					 I am pleased to splendidly hold a celebration meeting and the Korean photo, book, stamp and handicraft exhibition on the significant Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Jong Il brought warm spring not only to the Korean people but also to the progressives of the world.
					
					 To believe in the people as in Heaven was his motto all his life.
					
					 His dedications to the people and exploits will always be remembered.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Sweden
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Sweden
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A joint meeting of Nordic progressive political parties and friendly organizations took place in Sweden on Feb. 11 in the run-up to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display on the front wall of the venue of the meeting was a picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together.
					
					 Also displayed were photos dealing with the revolutionary careers and exploits of the great leaders and books and photos introducing the achievements made by the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the meeting were personages and members of the Communist Party in Sweden, the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Finnish Communists' League, the Finland-Korea Society and other progressive political parties, organizations for the study of the Juche idea and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in Nordic countries and the DPRK ambassador to Sweden and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants in the meeting laid bouquets and flowers before the picture of the great leaders standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The speakers highly praised Kim Jong Il as the peerlessly great man who made great contributions to protecting socialism, achieving peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and accomplishing the cause of independence against imperialism with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 A statement was read out.
					
					 The statement said the great exploits of Kim Jong Il would shine long and he would always be remembered by the world progressives.
					
					 A congratulatory message to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Marked by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Marked by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the 75th birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Feb. 4 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said that Kim Jong Il led the Arduous March, forced march, to victory, turning the DPRK into an impregnable socialist fortress with tremendous nuclear force and making an immortal contribution to accomplishing the cause of national reunification
					
					 It noted that the Korean people miss Kim Jong Il very much and are holding him in high esteem.
					
					 It pointed out that the friends of the DPRK and the followers of Juche idea and Songun idea are organizing political and cultural events with splendor to praise the feats Kim Jong Il performed for the global cause of independence.
					
					 The DPRK has a rosy future, it added.

articles.title: Papers Call for Accomplishing Kim Jong Il's Cause of Building Powerful Socialist Country
articles.content:
Papers Call for Accomplishing Kim Jong Il's Cause of Building Powerful Socialist Country
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK today editorially observe the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the revolutionary history of Kim Jong Il represents the course of heroic epic covered by the peerless statesman, iron-willed commander and peerless patriot who set an example of the era for building a powerful socialist country under the uplifted red flag of Juche.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Born as the son of the guerrillas in Mt Paektu, the holy mountain of the revolution, Kim Jong Il grew up to be a prominent revolutionary. He had steadily advanced the revolution and construction in keeping with the idea and intention of President Kim Il Sung, deeming it as his lifelong mission to carry forward to completion the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism, he developed our party, state and army into the party, the state and the army of the leader, ushered in a heyday of the era of the Workers' Party in all fields of politics and military, economy and culture and set a noble example in realizing the cause of immortalizing the leader with his revolutionary moral obligation unprecedented in the human history of politics.
					
					 It was the lifelong desire and iron will of Kim Jong Il to glorify the country as the great Paektusan nation to be envied by the world and as the socialist power where the ideal and dream of the people have come true.
					
					 The march to Mt Paektu to be made by the Korean people despite rain or snow is an orbit of Juche Kim Jong Il steadily followed and the road of winning the victory of socialism as it leads to successfully realizing his idea and cause.
					
					 All the party members and working people should make uninterrupted innovations and progress and stage successive offensive full of faith in the bright future of Juche Korea, keenly aware that self-reliance and self-development on all fronts for building a socialist power indicate a way out and their own strength is what they can count on. 
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all the people to get united as one in mind around respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and work hard to glorify the great Kim Jong Il's Korea before the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Palacio de Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Palacio de Sol Kumsusan 
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito a la hora 0 del dia 16 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan y rindio el sublime homenaje al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, los cuadros responsables del partido y el ejercito Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Myong Su, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, Ri Man Gon, O Su Yong, Kim Yong Chol, Choe Pu Il, Jo Yon Jun y Ri Pyong Chol y otros funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y las fuerzas armadas.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente entro en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Fue colocado ante las estatuas un cesto de flores en nombre del Maximo Dirigente.
					
					Tambien, se deposito otro a nombre comun del CC del PTC, la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Estado de la RPDC.
					
					Junto con los participantes, el Maximo Dirigente rindio sublime homenaje al Presidente y al Dirigente ante sus estatuas de pie.
					
					En el salon de eternidad donde esta conservado el cuerpo del Dirigente, el Maximo Dirigente le rindio sublime homenaje.
					
					Los participantes pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de las ordenes y del auto, el carro electrico, el barco y el vagon de tren, usados por el hasta el ultimo periodo de su vida para la orientacion sobre el terreno y la visita al extranjero.

articles.title: Cuadros rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Cuadros rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- En ocasion del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los cuadros directivos del Estado visitaron el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan para rendir homenaje a aquel.
					Entre ellos figuran Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y primer ministro de la RPDC, y otros cuadros directivos del Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los miembros del organo de direccion central del Partido en esta capital y los funcionarios de ministerios y organos centrales. 
					
					Ante las estatuas de pie de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il estaba colocado un cesto de flores a nombre de Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente del PTC y el Estado y el ejercito de la RPDC. 
					
					Tambien, se veia un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Estado de la RPDC. 
					
					Fue depositado alli un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC. 
					
					Los participantes rindieron sublime homenaje a los grandes Lideres antecesores ante sus estatuas de pie y en el salon de eternidad donde esta conservado el cuerpo del Dirigente.
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a la sala de conservacion de las ordenes del Dirigente y las otras de conservacion de carro, coche electrico, barco y vagon de tren usados por este gran hombre hasta el ultimo periodo de su vida para las visitas de orientacion y viajes al extranjero.
					
					El mismo dia, los oficiales y los soldados del EPC y los trabajadores de distintos estratos tambien visitaron el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan para rendir homenaje al Dirigente.

articles.title: Ceremonia de juramento de oficiales y soldados de EPC con motivo de 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Ceremonia de juramento de oficiales y soldados de EPC con motivo de 16 de febrero
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz, tuvo lugar el dia 15 en la plaza del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan la ceremonia de los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, maritimas, aereas y antiaereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea para rendir homenaje a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y jurar la fidelidad al Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un.
					  A la ocasion asistieron el vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el vicemariscal del EPC Ri Myong Su, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, y otros miembros de mando del EPC, los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas, los cadetes de las academias militares a todos los niveles y los estudiantes de las escuelas revolucionarias.
					
					Hubo la ceremonia de la banda militar del EPC.
					
					Todos los participantes rindieron homenaje postumo a los Generalisimos ante sus retratos con amplia sonrisa.
					
					  Dispararon las salvas.
					
					Hwang Pyong So pronuncio el discurso para rendir tributo a los grandes Lideres y jurar la fidelidad al Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un.
					
					  El orador subrayo que materializara incondicional y cabalmente los legados de los grandes Lideres tomandolos como la linea vital, de manera que defendera firmemente y glorificara para siempre las hazanas de los grandes Hombres sin pares realizadas en la construccion militar.
					
					  Anadio que perfeccionara estrictamente los preparativos de batalla decisiva final manteniendo el estado de disposicion combativa conforme a la demanda de la aguda situacion en que se tornan cada dia mas imprudentes las maniobras de guerra de agresion a la RPDC de los enemigos.
					
					Destaco que si se da orden, aniquilara a todos los agresores con el rotundo e implacable ataque preventivo y construira sin falta en la tierra patria una gran potencia reunificada.
					
					  Luego hubo desfiles de los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, maritimas, aereas y antiaereas del EPC, los cadetes de las academias militares a todos los niveles y los alumnos de las escuelas revolucionarias.
					
					  Al aparecer las banderas con los retratos con amplia sonrisa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, todos los participantes expresaron sublime homenaje hacia ellas.
					
					  Pasaron las filas al compas de las musicas militares revolucionaria flameando la bandera de Comandante Supremo.
					
					Acto seguido, fueron tiradas las salvas.

articles.title: Acto nacional de ONC por Dia de Estrella Luz
articles.content:
Acto nacional de ONC por Dia de Estrella Luz
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en esta capital el acto nacional de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea (ONC) por el 75o aniversario del natalicio del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il con la participacion de los delegados de la ONC provenientes de todas las provincias, los ninos escolares de esta capital y los otros que se ingresan en la ONC.
					Fueron invitados Choe Thae Bok, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Sung Du, presidente del Comite de Educacion, los funcionarios de de la Union de la Juventud y de los dominios interesados, los veteranos de guerra y los ameritados. 
					
					Al presentar el informe de la ocasion, el primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud, Jon Yong Nam, recordo que con la noble concepcion de las generaciones venideras, el Dirigente formo a los miembros de la nueva generacion como fidedignos continuadores de la Corea en prosperidad. 
					
					Enfatizo que gracias al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, continua invariablemente la historia de amor del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il a las generaciones venideras.
					
					Acto seguido, se efectuo la ceremonia de ingreso en la ONC.
					
					Nuevos integrantes de la ONC hicieron juramento siguiendo la voz guia de Choe Thae Bok. 
					
					Los funcionarios, los veteranos de guerra y los ameritados les pusieron las panoletas rojas y las insignias de la ONC a los miembros que se ingresan a la ONC.
					
					Los recien ingresados hicieron el primer saludo de pioneros en respuesta a la consigna "!Preparemonos siempre para la patria socialista!".
					
					En la ocasion hubo intervenciones de felicitacion.

articles.title: Consejo del Premio internacional Kim Jong Il ofrece banquete
articles.content:
Consejo del Premio internacional Kim Jong Il ofrece banquete 
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Consejo del Premio Internacional Kim Jong Il ofrecio el dia 16 un banquete con motivo de la ceremonia de otorgamiento del Premio Internacional Kim Jong Il.
					Al convite fueron invitados Kim Ki Nam, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Thae Hyong Chol, rector general de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, ministro de Educacion Superior y presidente de la Asociacion de Cientificos Sociales de Corea, y otros funcionarios coreanos, el secretario general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, Kenichi Ogami, y su comitiva. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes el secretario general del Consejo del Premio Internacional Kim Jong Il, Mukesh Sharma, y su comitiva, el consejero de la misma entidad y editor jefe del periodico ruso Zavtra, Alexandr Projanov, y su comitiva. 
					
					Los oradores subrayaron que el Premio Internacional Kim Jong Il se otorga a las celebres personalidades de los circulos politicos, sociales y academicos y los economistas quienes hicieron aporte especial a la lucha por la independencia de los paises y naciones, la verificacion de la independencia en el mundo entero, el cumplimiento de la causa de paz y el desarrollo de la cultura de la humanidad. 
					
					Y elogiaron altamente las hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Lanzados fuegos artificiales para Dia de Estrella Luz
articles.content:
Lanzados fuegos artificiales para Dia de Estrella Luz
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- En esta capital fueron disparados los fuegos artificiales para festejar el dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					El dia 16 por la noche, la Plaza Kim Il Sung y ambos lados del rio Taedong en torno al Monumento a la Idea Juche estaban repletos de los trabajadores de varios estratos, jovenes y ninos escolares agrupados para contemplar las salvas.
					
					A las 19:00, junto con la interpretacion de la cancion "Al camarada Kim Jong Il" se lanzaron los fuegos artificiales de distintos colores estremeciendo el cielo y la tierra.
					
					Contemplando la velada, los habitantes recordaron la vida del Dirigente quien escribio indelebles hazanas en los anales de la patria. 
					
					Se lanzaron uno tras otro los fuegos artificiales al compas de las canciones inclusive "Trueno en el pico Jong Il" y "El General utiliza el metodo de acortar las distancias", lo cual llevo al climax el ambiente festivo.
